label: Behavior 67162337
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 54.9450 + 0.0065 × t + 0.0001 × t², lon(t) ≈ 10.9491 + 0.0108 × t + 0.0007 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
